title: Can you direct me to a website that could tell me on what day of the week a particular date in history fell? Such as May 8, 1945, Victory in Europe day?  Or April 9, 1943?
text:
Here's a link to an online calculator that will tell you the day of
the week for any date in history:
http://www.searchforancestors.com/utility/dayofweek.html



Here's a website where you look up a date and see what happened on
that date:
http://www.nytimes.com/learning/general/onthisday/index.html
